{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-19T15:40:01.000Z", "description": "

Client located headquartered in Denver, Colorado is seeking a 100% remote Data Scientist for a long term contract position. This position will participate on a small team that will work with medical, claims, and policy related data that comes in a variety of formats \u2013 structured and unstructured - to generate insights and embed artificial intelligence into applications.


Required:

-Python.

-Strong modeling skills.

-Knowledge of BASH.

-SQL coding.


Desired:

-Data library experience (spaCy, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.).

-Experience working with insurance data (medical records, insurance claims, policy data).

-API development.

-Google Cloud Platform.
